title: Thermophysical properties of polyethylene glycol oligomers via molecular dynamics simulations
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28125-28137
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04898A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Thi H. Ho, Tong Duy Hien, Øivind Wilhelmsen, Thuat T. Trinh
The thermophysical properties of the polyethylene glycol oligomer obtained by the AMBER force field are in excellent agreement with experimental data.
